description: What do you like best about Performio?I like that keeping track of sales data has never been simpler and less time-consuming than what I am experiencing nowadays. I used to avoid complex verifying processes because of the huge time involved in them. I think that performing sales only taken around handful of steps now can say that my essence of work is decided mostly by this system. The forecast feature of the Performio is mainly what I prayed for – a simple sight of estimation of performance indicates on the dashboard always enables me to reconfigure my plans or renew my strategy whether I am in the conference room or at home or a coffee shop. The leaderboard especially when our top sellers are highlighted is remarkable too, it brings up a competitive yet friendly sort of atmosphere among team members. What do you dislike about Performio?The tablet version of Performio is not as good as the desktop experience. I had situations where I needed to access more complex tools while on the go but was not able to do anything until I got back to my desk. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Performio is the answer to my pressing problems. Now, I can check my sales performance easily and get a real-time view of the sales needing approval due to absence of documents. The clarity in the commission percentage of the disputes and the compensation resolution center services have freed me from innumerable pains. Today’s software has greatly improved my work process so that I can spend more time in doing what I can bring revenue with- selling and selling!

title: "Excellent and useful for managing everything related to commissions"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I like the learning curve, which is solid, and the support team is very friendly. I think Performio provides a good overview of the trade-offs and is easy to use, which is what we needed. Also, the cost tracking is excellent, as is the flexibility to add or remove tasks, and how helpful it is that it automatically generates all the information we need. What do you dislike about Performio?It was a little difficult to implement but once achieved everything is excellent. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Once it was launched, we were able to improve the management of compensation and solidarity rewards and also improve everything related to sales, and with Performio we were able to achieve this, it is simply excellent.

title: "Sales Commission Compensation Excellence"
description: What do you like best about Performio?Performio is a great tool that my Company uses to track/issue sales compensation commission for agents. What do you dislike about Performio?Sometimes the interface is not user friendly, specifically the fact that agents don't have a holistic dashboard to see all of their data at once. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Performio is performing all sales commission calculations and makes it so easy on the team to review.

title: "Performio is fantastic for tracking my monthly commissions and strive for excellence"
description: What do you like best about Performio?The accurate reporting around commision made off of every merchant and their transactions tracked, Seeing the exact amount I made for the month beforehand, accurate progress/target ratio helping you quickly understand how close you are to target during your current time period. What do you dislike about Performio?More accurate reporting around the commision broken up on a daily basis so I can have data around high and low transaction times. I would also like the see progress/target forecasts from the start of your target time frame and until the end. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Seeing what I had made the month prior in commision and being able to manually forecast how far I am from target. I also love seeing the breakdown on a merchant level of transactions, COGS, GST, and any other deuctions so I can understand that.

title: "An easy-to-view commission product with a good display panel"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I like the dashboard because it is easy to read the information and provides multiple perspectives on my performance and that of the team. Moreover, the commissions are easy to see and the information is well organized and easy to focus on, which is nice. What do you dislike about Performio?The platform is well built, however it does not have enough functions and it is a bit difficult to understand the information. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?It solves a lot of problems for us, especially with compensatory sales, we already had a clear view of commissions and the performance has improved a lot, many errors have been corrected and it has become a solid tool that helps us a lot, being a facilitator of commission payments, so we are happy with Performio.

title: "Performio Review"
description:
What do you like best about Performio?Performio is a powerful sales performance management platform that has significantly streamlined our commission tracking and reporting processes What do you dislike about Performio?Learning Curve
Pricing: For smaller businesses, Performio can be on the pricier side.

automated commission calculations have reduced errors and saved us countless hours of manual work. This feature alone has improved our efficiency dramatically.

title: "Great tool with extreme level of flexibility for business specific customization"
description: What do you like best about Performio?The flexibility of the software to adapt to almost all cases. Competitive pricing. Great support team and response time to tickets What do you dislike about Performio?The backend is hard to understand at first as an administrator. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Allowing sales reps to view compensation and quota attainment in one place as well as allow people managers to view their direct reports commissions/performance

title: "Sales compensation made easy with Performio"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I like being able to easily export the settled payments and get the necessary information, and we can calculate the commissions in real time, which saves a lot of time. On the other hand, it is excellent to be able to analyze in depth the earnings and the support team is excellent, and finally, its interface is good. What do you dislike about Performio?It is easy to use and everything works perfectly. Neither I nor any of our colleagues have had any complaints. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Performio does an unparalleled job. Today we can benefit from tracking revenue, sales, compensation, pulling data from spreadsheets and easy-to-calculate compensation plans and getting good end-to-end visibility for our team.

title: "He is very clear and updates me regularly"
description: What do you like best about Performio?It's really the most simple and straightforward tool I've used so far! And its clear and simple user interface is exactly what I expected from this platform. Performio has made tracking my commissions fun and easy. And I love the automation and reliability of this tool. What do you dislike about Performio?Y REALLY enjoy the platform. I have seen no downsides to using Performio. It helps me track my operating expenses and do proactive financial planning. Overall, I really enjoy Perfomio and have nothing bad to say. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Performio updates the information daily and gives you a commission forecast. In a soles role, it's very handy to always have your monthly bonuses in view. I also love that it shows me what to expect for my commission in real time.

title: "Use Performio for better commission management"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I like it because it allows me to carry out the compensation process for out sales in an automated way. It has a no-code architecture that is perfect for use by users without prior experience. Also, I love the incentive strategy, because it is quite aguile. What do you dislike about Performio?Excellent Software as a Service (SAAS). Performio is always right and they make sure my salary is the right amount. I have no complaints about this platform, it fits the company's needs very well. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?I use it primarily as an incentive compensation management provider. We also use it to easily and simply monitor sales for the month. Additionally, Performio has improved the transparency of commission records, our managers are now more agile and efficient.

title: "Not the worst but not the best"
description: What do you like best about Performio?That the data is easy to understand and easy to view What do you dislike about Performio?Long time to load data, often not updated or showing zeros. It doesn't intergrate well into much of our reporting and we need to create additional reports by hand to make the data useful to be implemented. There is seemingly no customer support, and the rating question comes up multiple times a day no matter how many times you say no. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?I can see my commission and sales targets to set goals.

title: "Excellent for transparency and visibility"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I love the clear and uncluttered platform, it shows exactly what I'm making in the different categories. It's really helpful to understand the breakdown of commissions throughout the month. I like the color charts that make it really easy to use. What do you dislike about Performio?I sometimes have a hard time keeping track of how much I will earn at the end of the month. I wish I could just go straight to the opportunity won. Sometimes it makes a while for the numbers to update. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?It makes it easy to see where you stand based on your metrics. It's very easy to understand how the platform works. It allows me to easily track my transactions and provides perfect reports on my sales.

title: "The visual part of the visualization is very nice and easy to understand, all at a glance"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I really like that it allows me to report issues I have with my pay. It also allows us to clearly organize our compensation plans and calculate payouts in a way that makes audits easy. What do you dislike about Performio?I think I have connectivity issues, but I'm not sure ir it's my internet, or the tool. I would also like the data to be downloaded in PDF format. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?The ability to send reports directly to sales reps is extremely helpful. There are also reporting and statement features which are great for end users. The breakdown of payments by section is also very helpful and makes everything easy to read and navigate.

title: "Performio is excellent for compensation analysis and goal tracking"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I like Performio because it is an effective tool for tracking our individual goals and progress. In addition, the experience is positive because of its clean and phenomenal interface. I also like the transparency and ease of understanding because so much can be accomplished with a few clicks. What do you dislike about Performio?Not much to say for now, I just wish they would improve the syncronization and real time update of commission numbers. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?Many problems solved and good benefits gained with Performio, especially the way it helps to track payments and it is a breakthrough because of its easy administration, use of spreadsheets and all without any glitches, it always works great for sales, compensation and legacy commissions, everything is on track.

title: "Works great - easy to use and understand"
description: What do you like best about Performio?The ease of use. It is a very user friendly product. We all use this product frequently and there are rarely any questions. What do you dislike about Performio?Sometimes the breakdown of pay for each month can be a little confusing. Maybe making a simplier month to month performance pay breakdown. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?How much we get paid for meetings and opportunities.

title: "Excellent support system.  This is easy to use and very precise.  Like riding a bike after first use"
description: What do you like best about Performio?I've been in my industry close to 35 years.  This sure beats figuring out commissions by hand.  This is precise, easy to operate and very accurate.  When mistakes are made or overrides are needed, everything is recorded, easily edited and every key stroke is recorded. What do you dislike about Performio?Not much to dislike.  I like everything about it.  Could use a mobile option that is easy to navigate. What problems is Performio solving and how is that benefiting you?this program just makes it easy to calculate compensation to my team, track adjustments to their sales performance and dispute charge-backs.
